text: a judge in the united states has thrown
out prince andrew's attempt to halt
proceedings in a civil lawsuit against
him the duke of york's lawyers had
argued that virginia dufrey who's
accused him of sexually assaulting her
when she was a teenager lives in
australia so is not a u.s resident
prince andrew has consistently denied
the allegations aruna ayenga has this
report
seen here at the age of 17 virginia
roberts now jifrey with prince andrew on
the left and gulen maxwell in the
background ms dufrey has accused prince
andrew of sexually assaulting her when
she was a teenager at the homes of
jeffrey epstein the convicted child sex
offender and gulen maxwell prince andrew
has consistently denied the allegations
the civil lawsuit seeks unspecified
damages
two efforts to stall the case were
blocked on saturday
u.s federal judge louis a kaplan told
the prince's lawyers they must hand over
key legal documents before a crucial
court hearing in new york on tuesday
he also rejected arguments by the
prince's lawyer andrew bretler that the
lawsuit should be dismissed because ms
giffrey a u.s citizen no longer lives in
the u.s this comes after gulen maxwell
was convicted this week of recruiting
and trafficking young girls to be
sexually abused by her boyfriend the
late american financier jeffrey epstein
between 1994 and 2004.
on tuesday judge kaplan will hear oral
arguments to decide whether virginia
dufrese lawsuit against prince andrew
will proceed aruna ienger bbc news
